backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access control, user profiles, subscriber and package management, billing structures, and admin/user‑restricted queries and mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a placeholder migration module that returns an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the role and functionality of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme configuration with light/dark variables and RTL-compatible base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configured for Arabic language and RTL layout, loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application coordinating auth, profile setup, subscriber login flow, role‑based navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an admin‑only access denied message using card and alert UI components.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen prompting unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity with Arabic RTL UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state with cache clearing and Arabic labels.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal component that collects name and phone from the user and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login state, storing identity, and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin state, packages, billing, and subscriber data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes, global styles, and RTL adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting USD amounts and converting numbers to bigint.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Utility functions for sanitizing, validating, formatting Iraqi phone numbers, and generating validation messages.
frontend/src/lib/placeholderPhone.ts: Detects backend-generated placeholder phone numbers by pattern.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Utility functions for validating, sanitizing, and constructing WhatsApp URLs and opening chats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/BillingPage.tsx: Billing page that lets admins select month/year and displays subscriber billing data with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with month/year selectors, placeholder billing stats, and an info alert indicating backend data is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/MyDuesPage.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's monthly dues with date selectors, error handling, and data fetched via useGetCallerMonthlyDue.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerOperationsPage.t: Provides navigation cards for owner functions including dashboard, subscribers, and billing management.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriberLoginPage.t: Implements subscriber login via phone number validation and claiming the subscriber record through useClaimSubscriber.
frontend/src/pages/SubscribersPage.tsx: Allows admins to manage subscribers including bulk import, adding single subscribers, and deleting all subscribers with related dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project state, existing features, and new feature requests for subscriber phone-number login.
